name: a very normal bike race
description:
a game made in 72 hours for minijam 86 with the theme no stopping

you entered the olympic bike race but your bike is malfunctioning and cannot stop going straight. to turn you must grapple onto nearby lamp posts to make it around the course in time

controls:

- hold the left mouse button to grapple to the nearest pole

tools used:

  • unity
  • blender
  • soundtrap
  • krita

honestly i'm not too happy with this game but hopefully it's fun
